name: The Magic Forest
description:
Can you exit the magic forest or will you be stuck wandering for eternity?

This game was made for Pizza Jam 2019 with the theme Wandering for Eternity.

Game developed by Illusia & Phinatic

Made with Ren'Py

Characters made with Mannequin

Backgrounds & items designed by Freepik

Music (Practicing with Magic) by Eric Matyas
